title: Packers need a glow up on SNF, Cowboys have RB questions, Trust the Chiefs?
itunes:title: Packers need a glow up on SNF, Cowboys have RB questions, Trust the Chiefs?
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Victor Cruz explain why the Packers need a 'glow up' performance against the 49ers on SNF. Are the Cowboys sticking with Ezekiel Elliott based on his past? Kay makes her fantasy football choices in 'Which Guy Wednesday' and Victor Cruz tells us how he almost lost out on his football career.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
